cloudflare_stack_decisions: Producer services publish canonical reputation loop envelopes directly to Cloudflare Queue (REP_EVENTS) with HTTP ingest fallback only when queue binding is absent.
clawrep queue consumer remains single source of profile mutation and idempotency enforcement (source_event_id unique in D1).
Queue consumers are configured with dead-letter queues for staging/prod and replay is exposed via admin endpoint.
Drift reports are persisted in D1 (rep_drift_reports) and emitted via audit trail for deterministic ops forensics.
